course_description: Students will learn to summarize and explore patterns and relationships in social and environmental data, conduct independent research, effectively communicate results and implications, and critically assess data-driven assertions.
prerequisites: QTM 100 or QTM_OX 100 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
